properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Dyer, TN; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 11:45AM CST until February 28 at 1:12AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Mississippi
River...Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Caruthersville
* from Tuesday February 11 until Thursday February 27.
* At 11 AM Monday the stage was 31.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 37.0 feet on Thursday February 20.
* Flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday February 11 and
continue to rise to near 37.0 feet by Thursday February 20.The
river will fall below flood stage by Thursday February 27.
* At 36.0 feet...Grain terminal area east of Blytheville, Arkansas is
flooding. In Tennessee, overbank flooding from the river is cutting
across the Barr Point. Suggs Road is flooded through the low spots.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
